TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Pudun, title = Pudun, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pudun} }

S.FORM: Pudun Itiniay i Jinfeng Cen no Taitung ko Pudun a niyaro', 36 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 133 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 129 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 4 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko .

Podon Itiniay i Jinfeng Cen no Taitong ko Podon a niyaro', 36 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 133 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 129 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 4 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko .
